name: Mumu's Pilgrimage
description:
Mumu's Pilgrimage is an RPG where you play as Mumu, a cat girl who is tasked with making a pilgrimage to all shrines of Bastet in order to prepare for her anointment as priestess of the feline goddess.

Travel the island of Folia Gatas, a place full of rats, monsters, elves, cats people and men, explore for treasure, meet friends and be the paragon of the way of Bastet to the rest of the world. 

The design of the game is inspired by old-school rogue-likes and table-top RPGs. It also references other games unrelated to RPGs that I enjoy. See if you can figure which they are!

You can play with the keyboard or a controller. Check the screenshots to see the controls. Mouse support is limited.

Mumu's Pilgrimage is open source. It's assets are under the creative common. Please, visit the Github page here: https://github.com/prdepinho/simple-rpg-engine

Also, follow me on Twitter to check on the development of the game: https://twitter.com/PaulodePinho2
